mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM accompany WHERE bbs_idx = #{bbs_idx} AND writer_idx = #{writer_idx} ORDER BY bbs_idx desc)a)b WHERE rnum >= #{startnum} AND rnum <= #{endnum}
mapper.update: UPDATE total_bbs SET content = #{content} WHERE bbs_idx = #{bbs_idx}
mapper.delete: UPDATE total_bbs SET status = 'defer' WHERE bbs_idx = #{bbs_idx}
